summary: This is a forwarded email from July 6, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest. An individual informs Geoffrey Berman, the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, that CNN has asked to confirm the arrest but has not inquired about any defense narrative.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of the email, being informed about CNN's inquiry regarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

events.title: CNN inquiry about Epstein arrest
events.description: CNN contacts an individual to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's arrest, but does not ask about any defense narrative or spin.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 6, 2019, the same day Jeffrey Epstein was arrested.
CNN is actively seeking confirmation of Epstein's arrest.
The communication is directed to Geoffrey Berman, the U.S. Attorney overseeing the case.
The email notes that CNN has not yet asked about any defense counsel narrative or spin.
